name: Ogre Skeleton
languages: understands all languages it spoke in life but can\'t speak

actions.Greatclub: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
